title: Highest Urban Population Concentration
description: In 2024, 100% of Singapore's urban population lived in the largest city, indicating a complete urban concentration.

title: Top Government Effectiveness
description: In 2023, Singapore achieved a perfect score of 100 in Government Effectiveness Percentile Rank, showcasing its exceptional governance.

title: Highest Regulatory Quality
description: Singapore scored 100 in Regulatory Quality Percentile Rank in 2023, reflecting its superior regulatory environment.

title: Lowest Arable Land Per Person
description: In 2021, Singapore had only 0.0001 hectares of arable land per person, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Lowest Foreign Direct Investment
description: In 2024, Singapore experienced a net foreign direct investment of -$96.7 billion, indicating a significant outflow.
